document.full_text: last year's runners-up united states edged past sweden 2-1 in their opening group tie at the world team cup monday, with mardy fish and john isner claiming the deciding doubles victory.
document.title: fish and isner help u.s. beat sweden 2-1
lines_and_colors: last year's runners-up united states edged past sweden 2-1 in their opening group tie at the world team cup monday, with mardy fish and john isner claiming the deciding doubles victory.
